Hi fellas.

I wanted to explore the possibility of adding a new HOF Uzit to my collection via trade (cash can be included if necessary).

If you have any interest in discussing a deal, please feel free to drop me a line.

We would have the following pieces to work with in a trade, and possibly a few others which are of a lesser significance.

Thank you.

Derek
Derek, you sure do have an eye for beautiful cards....wow.

I would like to bump this thread in the hopes of finding a trade partner.

Thank you.

Derek

PS

Thank you to those of you who have offered your kind words.
